text.div:
Consent Status

CodeDescriptionNederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
A Active - Consent has been grantedActief - Toestemming is gegevenadded v2.5
B Bypassed (Consent not sought)Overgeslagen - Toestemming is niet gevraagdadded v2.5
L Limited - Consent has been granted with limitationsBeperkt - Toestemming is gegeven met beperkingenadded v2.5
P Pending - Consent has not yet been soughtIn bewerking - Toestemming is nog niet gevraagdadded v2.5
R Refused - Consent has been refusedGeweigerd - Toestemming is geweigerdadded v2.5
X Rescinded - Consent was initially granted, but was subsequently revoked or ended.Ingetrokken - Toestemming is gegeven maar vervolgens ingetrokken of beëindigdadded v2.5

name: v2 Consent Status
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0498 ( Consent Status)

concept.display: Limited - Consent has been granted with limitations

designation.value: Beperkt - Toestemming is gegeven met beperkingen

concept.display: Pending - Consent has not yet been sought

designation.value: In bewerking - Toestemming is nog niet gevraagd

concept.display: Rescinded - Consent was initially granted, but was subsequently revoked or ended.

designation.value: Ingetrokken - Toestemming is gegeven maar vervolgens ingetrokken of beëindigd
